ygData.subject: Re: agil or dex?
ygData.msgSnippet: well that s good for me, my Dex is a lot higher than my Charisma, good news =)  thanks for reposting it.  bad news, the post was 17 days ago, and still no song
ygData.messageBody:
well that's good for me, my Dex is a lot higher than my Charisma, good news
=) thanks for reposting it. bad news, the post was 17 days ago, and still
no song =(

Shada

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Rodney Morris [mailto:rodmorris@...]
> Sent: Saturday, June 26, 1999 10:40 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] agil or dex?
>
>
> "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" wrote:
> > According to the post by J.M. last week regarding the mana
> use song, i
> > believe he said only Charisma is used to calculate our
> mana, though i don't
> > have the message anymore. as far as i know, no one really
> knows how much
> > mana the level 43 song uses because it is not available
> yet. J.M. said this
> > song would be in freeport and qeynos, and i have not seen
> it in freeport
> > yet. if it's available please let me know, i wanna try it out.
> >
> > Shada Silverleaf, Level 47 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
>
> I saved the post, and have attached it in its entirety. My
> apologies for the size of the post and usage of bandwidth.
>
> Rocket
> Mully, Veeshan
>
